verses.text: \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, don’t rebuke \w me|strong="H2142"\w* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H2142"\w* wrath, neither chasten \w me|strong="H2142"\w* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H2142"\w* hot displeasure.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* arrows \w have|strong="H3068"\w* pierced \w me|strong="H3256"\w*, \w your|strong="H3068"\w* hand presses hard \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3256"\w*.

There \w is|strong="H3027"\w* no soundness \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* flesh \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* indignation, neither \w is|strong="H3027"\w* there \w any|strong="H3588"\w* health \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* bones \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* sin.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* iniquities \w have|strong="H7965"\w* gone \w over|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w*. \w As|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* heavy burden, \w they|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H6106"\w* too heavy \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.
\w My|strong="H3588"\w* wounds \w are|strong="H5771"\w* loathsome \w and|strong="H7218"\w* corrupt \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* foolishness.

\w I|strong="H6440"\w* am \w in|strong="H6440"\w* pain \w and|strong="H6440"\w* bowed \w down|strong="H6440"\w* greatly. \w I|strong="H6440"\w* go mourning \w all|strong="H6440"\w* day \w long|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* waist \w is|strong="H3117"\w* filled \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w burning|strong="H1980"\w*. \w There|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* soundness \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* flesh.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am faint \w and|strong="H1320"\w* severely bruised. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* groaned \w by|strong="H3588"\w* reason \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* anguish \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* heart.

Lord, \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H5704"\w* desire \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w*. \w My|strong="H5704"\w* groaning \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w not|strong="H5704"\w* hidden \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* heart throbs. \w My|strong="H3605"\w* strength fails \w me|strong="H4480"\w*. \w As|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* light \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* eyes, \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H3605"\w* also \w left|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w My|strong="H5800"\w* lovers \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H5800"\w* friends \w stand|strong="H5869"\w* aloof \w from|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H5800"\w* plague. \w My|strong="H5800"\w* kinsmen \w stand|strong="H5869"\w* far away.

\w They|strong="H5975"\w* also \w who|strong="H7350"\w* seek \w after|strong="H7453"\w* \w my|strong="H5048"\w* life lay snares. Those \w who|strong="H7350"\w* seek \w my|strong="H5048"\w* hurt speak mischievous things, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* meditate deceits all day \w long|strong="H7350"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1696"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w*, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* deaf \w man|strong="H5315"\w*, don’t hear. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* am \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* mute \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* doesn’t open \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w*.

Yes, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am \w as|strong="H6310"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H2795"\w* \w who|strong="H3808"\w* doesn’t \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w in|strong="H8085"\w* whose \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w are|strong="H6310"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* reproofs.

\w For|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* hope \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*. \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* answer, Lord \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w*, “Don’t let \w them|strong="H6030"\w* gloat \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6030"\w*, \w or|strong="H3068"\w* exalt themselves \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6030"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* foot slips.”

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w ready|strong="H4131"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w fall|strong="H4131"\w*. \w My|strong="H5921"\w* pain \w is|strong="H3588"\w* continually \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* declare \w my|strong="H3588"\w* iniquity. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* sorry \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* sin.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H5046"\w* enemies \w are|strong="H2403"\w* vigorous \w and|strong="H2403"\w* many. \w Those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* hate \w me|strong="H5046"\w* \w without|strong="H3588"\w* reason \w are|strong="H2403"\w* numerous.

They \w who|strong="H2416"\w* \w give|strong="H2416"\w* evil \w for|strong="H2416"\w* good \w are|strong="H8267"\w* also adversaries \w to|strong="H2416"\w* \w me|strong="H8130"\w*, because I follow what \w is|strong="H2416"\w* good.

Don’t forsake \w me|strong="H7291"\w*, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*. \w My|strong="H8478"\w* \w God|strong="H7999"\w*, don’t \w be|strong="H7451"\w* far \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w me|strong="H7291"\w*.
Hurry \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w help|strong="H5800"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* salvation.
